appSourceList.name: ABC News
appSourceList.description: Your trusted source for breaking news, analysis, exclusive interviews, headlines, and videos at ABCNews.com.

appSourceList.name: Al Jazeera English
appSourceList.description: News, analysis from the Middle East and worldwide, multimedia and interactives, opinions, documentaries, podcasts, long reads and broadcast schedule.

appSourceList.name: Associated Press
appSourceList.description: The AP delivers in-depth coverage on the international, politics, lifestyle, business, and entertainment news.

appSourceList.name: Axios
appSourceList.description: Axios are a new media company delivering vital, trustworthy news and analysis in the most efficient, illuminating and shareable ways possible.

appSourceList.name: BBC News
appSourceList.description: Use BBC News for up-to-the-minute news, breaking news, video, audio and feature stories. BBC News provides trusted World and UK news as well as local and regional perspectives. Also entertainment, business, science, technology and health news.

appSourceList.name: Bloomberg
appSourceList.description: Bloomberg delivers business and markets news, data, analysis, and video to the world, featuring stories from Businessweek and Bloomberg News.

appSourceList.name: Breitbart News
appSourceList.description: Syndicated news and opinion website providing continuously updated headlines to top news and analysis sources.

appSourceList.name: Business Insider
appSourceList.description: Business Insider is a fast-growing business site with deep financial, media, tech, and other industry verticals. Launched in 2007, the site is now the largest business news site on the web.

appSourceList.name: CBS News
appSourceList.description: CBS News: dedicated to providing the best in journalism under standards it pioneered at the dawn of radio and television and continue in the digital age.

appSourceList.name: CNN
appSourceList.description: View the latest news and breaking news today for U.S., world, weather, entertainment, politics and health at CNN

appSourceList.name: Fox News
appSourceList.description: Breaking News, Latest News and Current News from FOXNews.com. Breaking news and video. Latest Current News: U.S., World, Entertainment, Health, Business, Technology, Politics, Sports.

appSourceList.name: MSNBC
appSourceList.description: Breaking news and in-depth analysis of the headlines, as well as commentary and informed perspectives from The Rachel Maddow Show, Morning Joe & more.

appSourceList.name: National Review
appSourceList.description: National Review: Conservative News, Opinion, Politics, Policy, & Current Events.

appSourceList.name: NBC News
appSourceList.description: Breaking news, videos, and the latest top stories in world news, business, politics, health and pop culture.

appSourceList.name: Newsweek
appSourceList.description: Newsweek provides in-depth analysis, news and opinion about international issues, technology, business, culture and politics.

appSourceList.name: New York Magazine
appSourceList.description: NYMAG and New York magazine cover the new, the undiscovered, the next in politics, culture, food, fashion, and behavior nationally, through a New York lens.

appSourceList.name: Politico
appSourceList.description: Political news about Congress, the White House, campaigns, lobbyists and issues.

appSourceList.name: Reuters
appSourceList.description: Reuters.com brings you the latest news from around the world, covering breaking news in business, politics, entertainment, technology, video and pictures.

appSourceList.name: The American Conservative
appSourceList.description: Realism and reform. A new voice for a new generation of conservatives.

appSourceList.name: The Hill
appSourceList.description: The Hill is a top US political website, read by the White House and more lawmakers than any other site -- vital for policy, politics and election campaigns.

appSourceList.name: The Huffington Post
appSourceList.description: The Huffington Post is a politically liberal American online news aggregator and blog that has both localized and international editions founded by Arianna Huffington, Kenneth Lerer, Andrew Breitbart, and Jonah Peretti, featuring columnists.

appSourceList.name: The Wall Street Journal
appSourceList.description: WSJ online coverage of breaking news and current headlines from the US and around the world. Top stories, photos, videos, detailed analysis and in-depth reporting.

appSourceList.name: The Washington Post
appSourceList.description: Breaking news and analysis on politics, business, world national news, entertainment more. In-depth DC, Virginia, Maryland news coverage including traffic, weather, crime, education, restaurant reviews and more.

appSourceList.name: The Washington Times
appSourceList.description: The Washington Times delivers breaking news and commentary on the issues that affect the future of our nation.

appSourceList.name: Time
appSourceList.description: Breaking news and analysis from TIME.com. Politics, world news, photos, video, tech reviews, health, science and entertainment news.

appSourceList.name: USA Today
appSourceList.description: Get the latest national, international, and political news at USATODAY.com.
